dc_description_s: This layer contains lines showing how parcels were historically divided in the Assessor's database, where two or more lots were merged into a single parcel. When the layer was originally created, it was used to illustrate lots that were owned and used in common and were combined to form a "main lot" for valuation purposes. More recently, any parcels that are merged trigger the creation of a sited parcel line to retain a historical record of the original parcel boundaries. Historical parcel IDs can be found in the "Supplemental Data" area in the assessing database. This data is updated through January 1, 2012.
dc_title_s: Sub Parcel Lines, Cambridge, Massachusetts, FY 2013
